channel.title: Posts on Moving images in space-time
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Moving images in space-time

item.title: The Irishman (2019)
item.description: ![](images/Main image.jpg) Directed by: Martin Scorsese Produced by: Martin Scorsese, Robert De Niro, Jane Rosenthal, Emma Tillinger Koskoff, Irwin Winkler, Gerald Chamales, Gastón Pavlovich, Randall Emmett, Gabriele Israilovici Screenplay by: Steven Zaillian Based on book: “I Heard You Paint Houses” by Charles Brandt Starring: Robert De Niro, Al Pacino, Joe Pesci Plot: Frank Sheeran (Robert De Niro), a Mafia hitman, looks back on his life and his mob carrier with emphasis on his relationships with famous American labour leader, Jimmy Hoffa (Al Pacino) and Russell Bufalino, the head of the Northeastern Pennsylvania crime family (Joe Pesci).

item.title: Moj drugi post
item.description: Ovdje je svašta samo nije ono što treba biti. Nadamo se boljem, ali očito nikad nije. Nemoj tu krivo biti.
